content: a gorgeous little top that you can pop on after a day the beach with your shorts this versatile tee is great fun to crochet following a six row repeat that is easy to memorise you ll make this in a few days ready for the weather to warm up a thread of paintbox metallic adds a little bit of sparkle **sizes** to fit bust 81 86 91 97 102 cm 32 34 36 38 40 in actual measurement 95 100 105 111 116 cm 37 ½ 39 ½ 41 43 ½ 45 ½ in finished length 46 46 47 47 48 cm 18 18 18 ½ 18 ½ 22 ¾ in **you will need** 50g balls of paintbox yarns cotton dk 3 3 4 4 4 × a - washed teal 3 3 3 4 4 × b - paper white 50g balls of paintbox yarns metallic dk 2 2 2 3 3 × c - woo woo 4mm uk 8 us g/6 crochet hook 2 stitch markers large eyed needle **gauge gauge ** 18 stitches and 15 row to 10 cm 4 in square worked in wave stitch pattern using 4mm uk 8 us g/6 crochet hook or size required to give correct gauge gauge
